pkgmetadata.longdescription: Service to enable modifed /boot/config.txt files to be safely tried out on the RPi3/4, by rotating in the old, last-known-good version and scheduling an automatic reboot to take place after a few minutes delay. The user can elect to keep the modified config prior to this reboot, by using the pyconfig_gen application (or at the CLI, via the rpi3-keep-config script).
